channel.title: Need help!
channel.description: :eek: my shops in fr33sc4p3 that i made wont work every time i trade them i lose connection plz help :eek:[br][size=1]Posted on: March 12, 2007, 05:38:32 PM[/size][hr]if there is anyway you can help post even if it doesnt have to do wit fr33sc4p3 cuz i am desperate for help[br][size=1]Posted on: March 12, 2007, 05:49:03 PM[/size][hr]hopefully some1 knows how to do this...

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

danie i dont know if you can remember me or not, but its me televator, a long time ago you use to have like a thread for helping people, now your a moparscape CM! =(

anyways spirit, all you have to do is make the voids, for my wizard it makes is so that the voids will send you to edge or to the altars rifts to runecraft.

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

one sec…

ok this is from my server, lets say my shop (wizard) this is what i have in my client to declare it.

else if (NPCID == 706) // Wizard Mizgog { skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX; skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY; if(q3stage == 0) NpcWanneTalk = 301; if(q3stage == 1 && !playerHasItemAmount(84, 1)) NpcWanneTalk = 304; if(q3stage == 1 && playerHasItemAmount(84, 1)) NpcWanneTalk = 305; if(q3stage == 2 && !playerHasItemAmount(4703, 1)) NpcWanneTalk = 311; if(q3stage == 2 && playerHasItemAmount(4703, 1)) NpcWanneTalk = 308; if(q3stage == 3 && !playerHasItemAmount(3006, 1)) NpcWanneTalk = 312; if(q3stage == 3 && playerHasItemAmount(3006, 1)) NpcWanneTalk = 313; if(q3stage == 4 && !playerHasItemAmount(744, 1)) NpcWanneTalk = 316; if(q3stage == 4 && playerHasItemAmount(744, 1)) NpcWanneTalk = 317; if(q3stage == 5 && !playerHasItemAmount(6070, 1)) NpcWanneTalk = 321; if(q3stage == 5 && playerHasItemAmount(6070, 1)) NpcWanneTalk = 322; if(q3stage >= 6 && !playerHasItemAmount(793, 1)) NpcWanneTalk = 325; if(q3stage == 7 && playerHasItemAmount(793, 1)) NpcWanneTalk = 326; }
